title: How to create a new email alert!
content: Skip to main content How to create a new email alert! Click the button above to login or create a profile.Pick the type of alert you wish to receive: General, Follow a Project, or Procurement.Pick the items of interest: countries/regions; topics; type of resources; languages; or procurement codes (depending on the type of alert).Name and save your alert. You can subscribe to multiple alerts and can change the alert preferences at any time
summary: Skip to main content How to create a new email alert!  Click the button above to login or create a profile. Pick the type of alert you wish to receive: General, Follow a Project, or Procurement.

gaps: climate: No mention of climate or carbon
poverty: No mention of poverty or inequality
partnership: No mention of partnership or collaboration
reform: No mention of reform or transformation
impact: No mention of impact or results
digital: No mention of digital or technology
jobs: No mention of employment or jobs
fragility: No mention of fragility or conflict
